_header: I welcome you brethren goodly in this hall
_description: A ‘sotelty’ for a bridal feast — five lines

BodLatMisC66.Transcription:
I welcombe you brethern godely in this hallIoy be vnto you
                    allthat euer this day it is now fallthat worthy lord that lay in an
                    Oxe stalleMayntayne your husbonde and you with your gyftys all
BodLatMisC66.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             The Babees Book, etc.
EETS
         o.s. 32 (1868); rev. ed.  Early English Meals and
                Manners London: Trübner, 1876; repr. 1973: 358.
